summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 网页中显示菜单。

span.span: Displays a menu in an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [菜单项Menu Items](#menu_items) - [静态数据Static Data](#static_data) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件可用于在 ASP.NET Web 页中显示的菜单，并通常与结合使用导航网站上的控件。The control is used to display a menu in an ASP.NET Web page and is often used in combination with a control for navigating a Web site. 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 允许控件的菜单项绑定到分层数据源的数据绑定。Data binding that allows the control's menu items to be bound to hierarchal data sources. - 通过与集成站点导航控件。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便动态创建菜单、 填充菜单项、 设置属性，依次类推。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically create menus, populate menu items, set properties, and so on. - 通过主题、 用户定义的映像，样式和用户定义的模板的自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, styles, and user-defined templates. 当用户单击菜单项，控件可以导航到链接的网页或只需将回发到服务器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果设置菜单项的属性，则控件导航到链接页; 否则，它将页面回发到服务器进行处理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 默认情况下，链接的页面显示在相同的窗口或框架的控件。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的窗口或框架显示链接的内容，请使用属性控件。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性会影响在控件中的每个菜单项。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要指定的窗口或框架的各个菜单项，设置属性直接对象。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 控件显示的菜单的两种类型： 静态菜单和动态菜单。The control displays two types of menus: a static menu and a dynamic menu. 静态菜单会始终以显示控件。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 默认情况下，在根级别 （级别 0） 的菜单项显示在静态菜单中。By default, the menu items at the root level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 可以通过设置静态菜单中显示更多菜单级别 （静态子菜单）属性。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 菜单比指定的值以更高级别的项 （如果有）属性显示动态菜单中。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic menu. 仅当用户将鼠标指针定位在父菜单项包含动态子菜单会显示动态菜单。A dynamic menu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 在某段持续时间后自动消失动态菜单。Dynamic menus automatically disappear after a certain duration. 使用属性指定持续时间。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 当用户单击菜单之外，还会消失动态菜单。A dynamic menu also disappears when the user clicks outside of the menu. 您还可以限制通过设置动态菜单中显示的级别数属性。You can also limit the number of levels displayed in a dynamic menu by setting the property. 菜单级别高于指定的值将被丢弃。Menu levels higher than the specified value are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 控件不是在内部使用控件。The control is not designed to be used inside an control. 你可以添加控件仅对外部页控件。You can add the control only to a page outside an control. 控制用于更新而不是使用回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 菜单项Menu Items A控件的菜单项由树组成对象。A control is made up of a tree of menu items represented by objects. 在顶层 （级别 0） 的菜单项称为根菜单项。Menu items at the top level (level 0) are called root menu items. 具有父菜单项的菜单项称为子菜单项。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a child menu item. 所有根菜单项都存储在集合。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子菜单项存储在父菜单项的集合。Child menu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 每个菜单项包含和属性。Each menu item has a and a property. 值属性显示在控件，而属性用于存储有关菜单项中，任何其他数据如数据传递到与菜单项关联的回发事件。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 单击时，菜单项可以导航到指示的另一个 Web 页属性。When clicked, a menu item can navigate to another Web page indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性未设置为菜单项，控件只需将页提交到服务器进行处理时单击该菜单项。If the property is not set for a menu item, the control simply submits the page to the server for processing when the menu item is clicked. 你可以还 （可选） 中显示图像的菜单项通过设置属性。You can also optionally display an image in a menu item by setting the property. 菜单项的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on menu items, see . ## 静态数据Static Data 最简单的数据模型的控件是静态菜单项。The simplest data model of the control is static menu items. 若要显示静态菜单项使用声明性语法，请首先打开和关闭``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To display static menu items using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，创建嵌套的菜单结构``元素开始标记和结束之间``标记。Next, create the menu structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每个``元素表示控件中的菜单项并将映射到对象。Each `` element represents a menu item in the control and maps to a object. 你可以通过设置特性的设置每个菜单项的属性及其``元素。You can set the properties of each menu item by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要创建子菜单项，嵌套其他``元素开始标记和结束之间``父菜单项的标记。To create submenu items, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent menu item. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以使用任何以分层方式进行数据源控件，如控件或控件。The control can use any hierarchal data source control, such as an control or a control. 若要将绑定到分层数据源控件，将设置属性控制转移到数据源控件的值。To bind to a hierarchal data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. 当绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），菜单项显示返回的值`ToString`默认情况下的数据项的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素，该菜单项显示显示菜单树的基础结构，但其他方面不是非常有用的元素名称。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu tree but is not very useful otherwise. 你可以通过使用菜单项绑定到特定数据项属性集合，以指定菜单项绑定。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by using the collection to specify menu item bindings. 集合包含定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系的对象。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 你可以指定的绑定和数据项属性的节点中显示的条件。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 菜单项绑定的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on menu item bindings, see . 无法创建在空节点通过设置或属性为空字符串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 将这些属性设置为空字符串作为未设置这些属性的效果相同。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在这种情况下，控件创建默认绑定使用属性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 有多种方法，以自定义的外观控件。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，你可以指定是否时呈现控件水平或垂直通过设置属性。First, you can specify whether the control is rendered horizontally or vertically by setting the property. 此外可以为每个菜单项类型指定不同的样式 （如字体大小和颜色）。You can also specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the menu item types. 级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 在上使用的控件的样式表的详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出可用菜单项样式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前所选动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前所选的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 而不是设置的单个样式属性，可以指定应用于根据其级别，通过使用下列样式集合的菜单项的样式。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the following style collections. |级别样式集合Level style collections|描述Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||集合对象用于控制根据级别的菜单项的样式。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items on a level basis.| ||集合为所选的级别的基础上的菜单项控件的样式的对象。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items on a level basis.| ||集合对象用于控制根据级别的子菜单项的样式。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items on a level basis.| 集合中的第一个样式对应于在菜单树中的第一个深度级别的菜单项的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于在第二个深度级别菜单树中，依次类推的菜单项的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 这是最常用于生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一深度的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用上表中列出的级别样式任何的集合定义的样式控件，这些样式设置替代的各个菜单项样式属性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 若要更改控件的外观的另一种方法是自定义中显示的图像控件。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images displayed in the control. 可以通过设置以下表所示的属性来指定控件的不同部分自己自定义映像。You can specify your own custom image for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |映像属性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||要与其他菜单项隔开的动态菜单项底部显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||动态菜单项以指示它具有子菜单中显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed in a dynamic menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||要与其他菜单项隔开的动态菜单项顶部显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed at the top of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||在菜单项以指示用户可以滚动查看更多菜单项底部显示的图像。The image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items.| ||在菜单项以指示用户可以向上滚动到视图额外的菜单项顶部显示的图像。The image displayed at the top of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll up to view additional menu items.| ||要与其他菜单项隔开的静态菜单项底部显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||静态菜单项以指示它具有子菜单中显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed in a static menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||要与其他菜单项隔开的静态菜单项顶部显示的可选图像。An optional image displayed at the top of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 对于用户界面 (UI) 的完全控制，你可以定义自己的自定义模板控制是通过使用以下模板属性。For complete control of the user interface (UI), you can define your own custom templates for the control using the following template properties. |模板属性Template property|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||包含动态菜单项呈现自定义内容的模板。The template that contains the custom content to render for a dynamic menu item.| ||包含要呈现为静态菜单项的自定义内容的模板。The template that contains the custom content to render for a static menu item.| 你可以通过设置来控制动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的垂直和水平位置和属性，分别。You can control the vertical and horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item by setting the and properties, respectively. 若要控制静态菜单中的静态子菜单项的缩进，请使用属性。To control the indentation of the static submenu items within a static menu, use the property. ## 事件Events 控件提供可以编程的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这允许你每次事件发生时运行的自定义的例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了受支持的事件。The following table lists the supported events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||单击菜单项时发生。Occurs when a menu item is clicked. 此事件通常用于同步与页面上的另一个控件的控件。This event is commonly used to synchronize a control with another control on the page.| ||菜单项绑定到数据时发生。Occurs when a menu item is bound to data. 此事件通常用于在呈现之前修改菜单项控件。This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a control.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有静态菜单项控件使用声明性语法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with static menu items using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定控制转移到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例站点站点地图数据复制到一个名为 Web.sitemap 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您以编程方式访问的实例类控件。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for the control. 你可以将控件添加到集合、 从集合中，删除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义控件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此成员类。This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 使用方法将数据绑定到数据源从控件。Use the method to bind data from a data source to the control. 此方法会解析所有活动模板中的控件的数据绑定表达式。This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.

para.span: 数据绑定控件应重写而不是。

span.span: Data-bound controls should override instead of .

para.span: 如果被重写，和以错误的顺序引发事件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataBindings As MenuItemBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

value.span: ，表示数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含定义数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系的对象。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 当绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），菜单项显示返回的值`ToString()`默认情况下的数据项的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素，该菜单项显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的树中，否则不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 通过指定菜单项绑定，可以将菜单项绑定到特定数据项属性。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by specifying menu item bindings. 在定义数据项和菜单项之间的关系时，你必须指定用于绑定和数据项目的属性将绑定到这两个条件。When defining the relationship between a data item and a menu item, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the property of a data item to bind to. 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 与深度和 / 或数据成员，可以指定条件。The criteria can be specified with a depth, a data member, or both. 深度指定获取绑定的菜单级别。The depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，如果你指定的深度为 0，级别 0 树状结构中的所有菜单项会都绑定使用的菜单项绑定。For example, if you specify a depth of 0, all menu items in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the menu item binding. 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果选择多个对象定义相互冲突控件适用以下优先顺序中的菜单项绑定：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 只定义深度的对象。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 定义仅的数据成员的对象。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 绑定条件建立后，你可以随后绑定的属性能够绑定到某个属性或字段的数据项目的对象。Once the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that is able to be bound to an attribute or field of a data item. 例如，你可以将绑定菜单项上设置的 XML 元素的文本属性的属性属性对象。For example, you can bind the property of a menu item to the text attribute on an XML element by setting the property of a object. 你还可以绑定到静态值。You can also bind to a static value. 如果你设置属性对象、 对其的所有菜单项应用对象共享相同的静态文本值。If you set the property of a object, all menu items to which the object is applied share the same static text value. 有关绑定的属性的更多信息对象转换为一个值，请参阅。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 尽管可以以编程方式填充集合，通常以声明方式设置。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定菜单项绑定，应首先嵌套开始和结束``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify the menu item bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，将放置``元素开始标记和结束之间``标记每个菜单项绑定你想要指定。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each menu item binding you want to specify. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合定义的字段之间的关系控制和中的菜单项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DisappearAfter { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标指针不再置于菜单上后显示动态菜单的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration for which a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 鼠标指针不再置于菜单上后，显示动态菜单的时间量（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time (in milliseconds) a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 默认值为 500。

span.span: The default is 500.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，动态菜单会自动消失后某些当鼠标指针不再置于菜单的持续时间。By default, a dynamic menu automatically disappears after a certain duration when the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu. 使用属性指定持续时间。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户单击菜单之外，动态菜单将立即消失。A dynamic menu disappears immediately if the user clicks outside of the menu. 你还可以指定动态菜单应永远不会自动消失此属性设置为-1。You can also specify that a dynamic menu should never automatically disappear by setting this property to -1. 在这种情况下，仅当用户单击菜单之外时，将消失动态菜单项。In this case, the dynamic menu item will disappear only when the user clicks outside the menu. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定用户将鼠标指针离开菜单移超过两个秒后动态菜单应该会消失。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a dynamic menu should disappear after the user moves the mouse pointer away from the menu for more than two seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/CS/menudisappearaftercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/VB/menudisappearaftervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像显示在各动态菜单项底部，将动态菜单项与其他菜单项隔开。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.

value.span: 显示在各动态菜单项底部的分隔符图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a separator image displayed at the bottom of each dynamic menu item.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个可选的自定义图像在各动态菜单项底部显示。Use the property to specify an optional custom image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu item. 此映像充当菜单项之间的分隔符，并且通常是一条线的映像。This image acts as a separator between menu items and is commonly an image of a line. > [!NOTE] > 你还可以显示分隔符图像在各动态菜单项顶部通过设置属性。You can also display a separator image at the top of each dynamic menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示在各动态菜单项底部的分隔符图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a separator image at the bottom of each dynamic menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl/CS/menudynamicbottomseparatorimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl/VB/menudynamicbottomseparatorimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示内置图像，其中内置图像指示动态菜单项具有子菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in image that indicates that a dynamic menu item has a submenu is displayed.

value.span: 如果具有子菜单的动态菜单项显示内置图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the built-in image for dynamic menu items with submenus; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当动态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以通过将鼠标指针定位菜单项中展开该菜单。When a dynamic menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu by positioning the mouse pointer over the menu item. 有两种方法，以显示此图像：There are two ways to display this image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果设置属性，该映像重写内置的映像。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置属性和属性设置为`false`，不显示任何图像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. 你可以通过设置指定的图像的替换文字属性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. 当用户将鼠标指针定位图像上方时，此文本显示为工具提示。This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image. 此文本还提供了辅助技术设备可用于使控件更易于访问的映像的说明。This text also provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏指示动态菜单项包含子菜单的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the image that indicates that a dynamic menu item has a submenu. 属性还必须设置为空字符串 ("") 为隐藏的映像。The property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage/CS/menudynamicenabledefaultpopoutimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage/VB/menudynamicenabledefaultpopoutimagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DynamicHorizontalOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平移动像素数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平移动像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来调整动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的水平位置。Use the property to adjust the horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 此属性影响的位置的动态菜单以不同的方式取决于是否垂直或水平显示的控件 (如指定的那样属性)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表介绍的差异。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|默认情况下，其父菜单项的正下方显示动态菜单。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item. 如果设置此属性，则可从此基位置水平移动动态菜单位置。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position horizontally from this base position.| |垂直Vertical|默认情况下，没有任何两者之间的间距其父菜单项旁边显示动态菜单项。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 如果设置此属性可控制动态菜单项和其父菜单项之间的水平间距。Setting this property controls the horizontal spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| > [!NOTE] > 你可以将此属性设置为负值可动态菜单反方向移动。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果显示垂直菜单，负值则会导致动态菜单项和重叠其父菜单项。If you are displaying a vertical menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定间隙动态菜单项和其父菜单项之间的 5 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a 5-pixel gap between a dynamic menu and its parent menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/CS/menudynamichorizontaloffsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/VB/menudynamichorizontaloffsetvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets a reference to the object that allows you to set the appearance of a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.

value.span: 对 对象的引用，该对象表示鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时的菜单项样式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`). 按以下顺序应用动态菜单项的样式属性：Style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将动态菜单项的背景色更改为 sky 浅蓝，当用户鼠标指针悬停它。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the background color of a dynamic menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHoverStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHoverStyle/CS/menudynamichoverstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHoverStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHoverStyle/VB/menudynamichoverstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与所有动态显示的菜单项一起显示的附加文本。

span.span: Gets or sets additional text shown with all menu items that are dynamically displayed.

value.span: 与所有菜单项一起显示的附加文本或字符。

span.span: The additional text or characters that appear with all menu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于插入文本以设置动态菜单项在移动设备上显示的菜单。This property can be used to insert text to format dynamic menu items in a menu displayed on mobile devices. 控件支持静态和动态菜单项的显示模板。The control supports templates for the display of static and dynamic menu items. 对于移动设备，模板将被忽略，因此此属性可用于添加字符或文本格式应用于菜单项不使用模板。For mobile devices, templates are ignored, so this property allows you to add characters or text to apply formatting to menu items without using a template. > [!NOTE] > 若要获得一致的格式时使用此属性，你应设置如果你想要静态和动态菜单项之间完全相同的格式设置的属性。To achieve consistent formatting when you use this property, you should also set the property if you want the formatting to be identical between the static and dynamic menu items. 如果应用模板格式设置和此属性，模板格式对于移动设备将忽略。If both template formatting and this property are applied, the template formatting is ignored for mobile devices. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性将文本添加到每个菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to add text to each menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是为动态菜单中使用的内置呈现，你可以通过定义你自己的动态菜单项的外观和感觉属性。Instead of using the built-in rendering for a dynamic menu, you can define your own look and feel for a dynamic menu item by using the property. 若要指定动态菜单项的自定义模板，请先``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify a custom template for a dynamic menu item, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 你可以通过使用进一步控制动态菜单的样式属性。You can further control the style of a dynamic menu by using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制动态菜单中的菜单项的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the menu items within a dynamic menu. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `DynamicMenuItemStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DynamicMenuItemStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `DynamicMenuItemStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DynamicMenuItemStyle.ForeColor`). 按以下顺序应用动态菜单项的样式属性：Style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以指定动态菜单中的菜单项的浅天蓝色背景颜色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a light sky blue background color for the menu items in a dynamic menu. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当动态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以展开该菜单。When a dynamic menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu. 使用属性指定此映像的替换文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for this image. 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 有两种方法来显示图像：There are two ways to display the image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于内置的映像和自定义映像。This property applies to both the built-in image and the custom image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定用于指示动态菜单项包含子菜单的图像的替换文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that a dynamic menu item has a submenu. 当用户将鼠标指针定位图像上方时，此文本显示为工具提示。This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当动态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以通过将鼠标指针定位菜单项中展开该菜单。When a dynamic menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu by positioning the mouse pointer over the menu item. 有两种方法，以显示此图像：There are two ways to display this image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果设置属性，该映像重写内置的映像。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image. 如果未设置属性和属性设置为`false`，不显示任何图像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性时，使用斜杠标记 （/） 而不是反斜杠 (\\)。When you set this property, use a slash mark (/) instead of a backslash (\\). 如果在路径中使用反斜杠，将不会显示指定的映像。If you use backslashes in the path, the specified image will not be displayed. 你可以通过设置指定的图像的替换文字属性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在动态菜单项以指示该菜单项具有子菜单中显示的自定义映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display in a dynamic menu item to indicate that the menu item has a submenu. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来调整动态菜单相对于其父菜单项的垂直位置。Use the property to adjust the vertical position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 此属性影响的位置的动态菜单以不同的方式取决于是否垂直或水平显示的控件 (如指定的那样属性)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表介绍的差异。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|默认情况下，没有任何两者之间的间距其父菜单项的正下方显示动态菜单。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 如果设置此属性可控制动态菜单项和其父菜单项之间的垂直间距。Setting this property controls the vertical spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| |垂直Vertical|默认情况下，将显示其父菜单项旁边对齐的上边缘与动态菜单项。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item with the top edges aligned. 如果设置此属性，则可从此基位置垂直移动动态菜单位置。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position vertically from this base position.| > [!NOTE] > 你可以将此属性设置为负值可动态菜单反方向移动。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果显示水平菜单，负值则会导致动态菜单项和重叠其父菜单项。If you are displaying a horizontal menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用动态菜单向下移动 x 10 像素从其父菜单项顶部的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to shift a dynamic menu down by 10 pixels from the top of its parent menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/CS/menudynamichorizontaloffsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/VB/menudynamichorizontaloffsetvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 CSS 样式来控制其在浏览器的外观。The control uses CSS styles to control its appearance in a browser. 默认情况下，它将呈现`style`它使用元素的 CSS 类包含的 CSS 定义。By default, it renders a `style` element that contains the CSS definitions for the CSS classes that it uses. 通常将此属性设置为`false`在以下情况：You typically set this property to `false` in the following situations: - 你想要提供自己的 CSS 定义以自定义菜单的外观。You want to provide your own CSS definitions in order to customize the appearance of the menu. 然后，必须提供您自己的 CSS 定义在页中，阻止或包括指向外部 CSS 文件包含定义的。You must then provide your own block of CSS definitions in the page, or include a link to an external CSS file that contains the definitions. - 你想要保留的默认外观，但希望在单独文件中保留的生成的 CSS 定义。You want to keep the default appearance but prefer to keep the generated CSS definitions in a separate file. 然后，您必须提供文件并链接到它。You must then provide the file and link to it. 无论在哪种情况下，你可以获取一份默认 CSS 块，控件生成属性设置为`true`、 运行页上，并在浏览器中查看页面。In either of these situations, you can get a copy of the default CSS block that the control generates by setting the property to `true`, running the page, and viewing the page in a browser. 可以查看页面源文件中的浏览器和副本，然后可将 CSS 块粘贴到页面标记或单独的文件。You can then view the page source in the browser and copy and paste the CSS block into the page markup or into a separate file. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，无法设置样式属性。If you set this property to `false`, you cannot set style properties. 例如，你不能添加`DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`中标记或一组属性`DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`在代码中的属性。For example, you cannot add a `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor` attribute in markup or set the `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor` property in code.

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象包含的样式设置是根据菜单项在 控件中的级别应用于菜单项的。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the style settings that are applied to menu items based on their level in a control.

value.span: ，包含的样式设置是根据菜单项在 控件中的级别应用于菜单项的。

span.span: A that contains the style settings that are applied to menu items based on their level in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为单个样式属性的替代方法的集合 (如) 来控制各个菜单的级别上的菜单项的样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as ) to control the style of menu items at the individual levels of the menu. 此集合中包含的样式应用于根据其菜单级别的菜单项。The styles contained in this collection are applied to the menu items based on their menu level. 集合中的第一个样式对应于菜单上的第一个级别中的菜单项的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单上，依次类推的第二个级别中的菜单项的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the second level of the menu, and so on. 此集合通常用于生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果样式定义某些级别使用任何菜单项集合，会覆盖该级别样式的菜单项的设置。If a style is defined for a certain level using the collection, this overrides any menu item style settings for the menu items at that level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合将样式设置应用到中的菜单项控件根据其级别。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to apply style settings to the menu items in a control based on their level. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/CS/menulevelmenuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/VB/menulevelmenuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为的替代方法的集合和属性来控制各个菜单的级别上的选定的菜单项的样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the and properties to control the style of a selected menu item at the individual levels of the menu. 此集合中包含的样式应用于基于其菜单级别的选定的菜单项。The styles contained in this collection are applied to a selected menu item based on its menu level. 集合中的第一个样式对应于菜单上的第一个级别中的选定的菜单项的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of a selected menu item in the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单上，依次类推的第二个级别中的选定的菜单项的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of a selected menu item in the second level of the menu, and so on. 此集合通常用于生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果样式定义某些级别使用集合，这将覆盖和该级别的属性。If a style is defined for a certain level using the collection, this overrides the and properties at that level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以将样式设置应用到选定的菜单项控件基于其级别。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to apply a style setting to the selected menu item in a control based on its level. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为单个样式属性的替代方法的集合 (如) 来控制各个级别上的静态菜单中显示的静态子菜单项的样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as ) to control the style of the static submenu items displayed in the static menu at the individual levels. 此集合中包含的样式应用于根据其菜单级别的静态子菜单项。The styles contained in this collection are applied to the static submenu items based on their menu level. 集合中的第一个样式对应于静态菜单中显示的第一个静态子级别的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the first static submenu level displayed in the static menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应于第二个级别显示在静态菜单上，依次类推的子菜单的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the second submenu level displayed in the static menu, and so on. 此集合通常用于生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果样式定义某些级别使用在该级别的所有静态子菜单项集合，此将重写样式设置。If a style is defined for a certain level using the collection, this overrides any static submenu item style settings at that level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以将样式设置应用的静态菜单中显示的子菜单项控件根据其级别。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to apply style settings to the submenu items displayed in the static menu of a control based on their level. summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单的菜单呈现级别数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.

value.span: 动态菜单的菜单呈现级别数。

span.span: The number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.

value.span: 默认值为 3。

span.span: The default is 3.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置静态菜单中显示多个菜单级别属性的值大于 1。You can display multiple menu levels in the static menu by setting the property to a value greater than 1. 你也可以通过将此属性设置为一个值大于 0 动态菜单中显示其他级别。You can also display additional levels in dynamic menus by setting this property to a value greater than 0. 例如，如果你在静态菜单中显示两个菜单级别 (通过设置属性设置为 2) 然后将此属性设置为 3，级别显示动态菜单中的三个额外的菜单。For example, if you display two menu levels in the static menu (by setting the property to 2) and then set this property to 3, three additional menu levels are displayed in dynamic menus. 所有剩余更高版本菜单级别 （如果有） 将被丢弃。All remaining higher menu levels (if any) are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 将此属性设置为 0，会显示到由指定级别平面菜单属性，而无需任何动态菜单。Setting this property to 0 displays a flat menu up to the level specified by the property, without any dynamic menus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可限制的菜单中为 1 动态菜单显示级别数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to limit the number of menu levels to display in a dynamic menu to 1. 根的菜单级别显示。Only the root menu level is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels/CS/menumaximumdynamicdisplaylevelscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMaximumDynamicDisplayLevels/VB/menumaximumdynamicdisplaylevelsvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为一个小于 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuItemClick As MenuEventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 控件中的菜单项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a menu item in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中单击菜单项时引发事件控件。The event is raised when a menu item is clicked in a control. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，如每次此事件发生时，将另一个控件在页上，与同步。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing with another control on the page, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于访问引发事件的菜单项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的事件处理程序显示由用户选择的菜单项的文本的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event that displays the text of the menu item selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuMenuItemClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMenuItemClick/CS/menumenuitemclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuMenuItemClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuMenuItemClick/VB/menumenuitemclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuItemDataBound As MenuEventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件中的菜单项绑定到数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a menu item in a control is bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 菜单项绑定到中的数据时将引发事件控件。The event is raised when a menu item is bound to data in a control. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，例如添加自定义内容或呈现之前就进行，每次此事件发生时修改菜单项。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content or modifying a menu item before it is rendered, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于访问引发事件的菜单项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的事件处理程序修改的文本的事件`Home`菜单项显示在之前控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event that modifies the text of the `Home` menu item before it is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemDataBound/CS/menumenuitemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemDataBound/VB/menumenuitemdataboundvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时数据绑定到引发事件控件。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 此方法通知控件来执行与之关联的任何数据绑定逻辑。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 方法允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 此方法通常时扩展由控件开发人员使用类。This method is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此方法通知，Web 服务器控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，当调用此方法时，无论是否的子级或父级到该控件不能访问其他服务器控件。Additionally, you cannot access another server control when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的呈现方向控件。Use the property to specify the direction in which to render the control. 下表列出了可用的方向。The following table lists the available directions. |方向Orientation|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Orientation.Horizontal`|水平呈现控件。The control is rendered horizontally.| |`Orientation.Vertical`|垂直呈现控件。The control is rendered vertically.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以显示水平菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a horizontal menu. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个菜单项 (由表示对象) 中控件具有属性，用于指定菜单项的位置。Each menu item (represented by a object) in the control has a property that specifies the position of the menu item. 值路径是分隔的值，它构成从根菜单项到当前的菜单项的路径的字符串。The value path is a string of delimited values that form the path from a root menu item to the current menu item. 使用属性指定分隔字符用于分隔菜单路径中的值。Use the property to specify the delimiting character used to separate the values in the menu path. 在分析单个值的列表时，通常使用此值。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values. 具体取决于中显示的文本控件，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。Depending on the text displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果设置为逗号分隔符字符，显示的文本不能包含任何逗号;否则为属性不能准确地分析。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the property cannot be parsed accurately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性更改为逗号的菜单项的值路径的分隔符字符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the delimiter character for a menu item's value path to a comma. remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性确定菜单控件，如何呈现标记控件。The value of the property determines how the menu control renders markup for the control. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和早期版本中，控件使用 HTML`table`元素和内联样式，以在浏览器中指定菜单的外观。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles to specify the appearance of the menu in a browser. 在 ASP.NET 4 和更高版本，默认情况下的控件使用 HTML`listitem`元素和级联样式表 (CSS) 样式。In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, by default the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles. 如果你未设置此属性，控件呈现的适用于由指示 ASP.NET 版本的标记属性。If you do not set this property, the control renders markup that is appropriate to the ASP.NET version that is indicated by the property. 控件使用以下规则：The control uses the following rules: - 如果值属性是`3.5`、控件使用 HTML`table`元素和内联样式。If the value of the property is `3.5`, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles. - 如果值属性是`4.0`或更高版本，控件使用 HTML`listitem`元素和 CSS 样式。If the value of the property is `4.0` or greater, the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and CSS styles. 提供此属性是为了向后兼容。This property is provided for backward compatibility. 如果属性指示您希望控件生成 HTML 兼容 ASP.NET 4 或更高版本，但你想控制要使用以前的行为异常，你可以将此属性设置为。If the property indicates that you want controls to generate HTML that is compatible with ASP.NET 4 or later, but you want the control to be an exception that uses earlier behavior, you can set this property to . 例如，如果你有从右到左显示文本的网页你可能想要将此属性设置为由于某些浏览器不显示从右向左的文本为正确的模式标记。For example, if you have a Web page that displays text from right to left you might want to set this property to because some browsers do not display the mode markup properly for right-to-left text.

summary.span: 获取或设置动态菜单中显示的图像的 URL，以指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.

value.span: 动态菜单中显示的图像的 URL，指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项。

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET 4.0 呈现模式下不支持此属性。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果此属性是必需的可以通过在页面的代码中添加以下来菜单设置为.NET 3.5 呈现模式下：If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 使用属性来指定要在各动态菜单以指示用户可以向下滚动查看更多菜单项底部显示的自定义映像。Use the property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items. > [!NOTE] > 如果此属性未设置，内部，会使用默认图像。If this property is not set, the internal, default image is used. 你可以通过设置指定的图像的替换文字属性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示自定义映像，该值指示用户可以向下滚动在动态菜单中的其他菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom image indicating that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/CS/menuscrolldownimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/VB/menuscrolldownimagevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The alternate text for the image specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET 4.0 呈现模式下不支持此属性。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果此属性是必需的可以通过在页面的代码中添加以下来菜单设置为.NET 3.5 呈现模式下：If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 当动态菜单项包含底部的菜单上的其他项时，则会显示图像指示用户可以滚动查看更多菜单项。When a dynamic menu item contains additional items at the bottom of the menu, an image is displayed to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items. 使用属性指定此映像的替换文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for this image. 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定用于指示用户可以向下滚动中额外的菜单项的动态菜单的图像的替换文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/CS/menuscrolldownimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/VB/menuscrolldownimagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SkipLinkText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置屏幕读取器所读取的隐藏图像的替换文字，以提供跳过链接列表的功能。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 屏幕读取器所读取的隐藏图像的替换文字，可提供跳过链接列表的功能。

span.span: The alternate text of a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的隐藏图像的替换文字读取由屏幕阅读器，以提供跳过的链接列表的功能。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. 你指定的文本提供的说明在隐藏的辅助技术设备跳过的可用于使控件更易于访问的链接图像。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden skip link image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 控件提供屏幕读取器可以跳过整个控件的方法的属性。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果属性设置，则呈现不可见的图像的替换文字，向用户提供的选项以跳转到该控件的结尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 屏幕读取器读取的替换文字，而图像占用只有一个像素的空间。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, and the image occupies only one pixel space. 对于页面的呈现的像素精确控制，设置属性为空字符串 ("") 并提供你自己的机制以跳过菜单。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the menu. 默认属性设置为空字符串。The property is set to the empty string by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的隐藏图像的替换文字读取由屏幕阅读器，以提供跳过的链接列表的功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/CS/menuskiplinktextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/VB/menuskiplinktextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个自定义映像以在各静态菜单的底部显示项，充当菜单项之间的分隔符。Use the property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each static menu item that acts as a separator between menu items. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，你还可以显示分隔符图像在各静态菜单项顶部通过设置属性。As an alternative, you can also display a separator image at the top of each static menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的分隔符图像在各静态菜单项底部显示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a separator image to display at the bottom of each static menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当静态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以展开该菜单。When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu. 有两种方法，以显示此图像：There are two ways to display this image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果设置属性，该映像重写内置图像，而不考虑的值属性。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image, regardless of the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置属性和属性设置为`false`，不显示任何图像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. 你可以通过设置指定的图像的替换文字属性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏指示静态菜单项包含子菜单的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the image that indicates that a static menu item has a submenu. 属性还必须设置为空字符串 ("") 为隐藏的映像。The property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`). 按以下顺序应用静态菜单项的样式属性：Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性时用户将鼠标指针定位在其上为 sky 浅蓝更改静态菜单项的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the background color of a static menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuStaticHoverStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuStaticHoverStyle/CS/menustatichoverstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuStaticHoverStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuStaticHoverStyle/VB/menustatichoverstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与所有静态显示的菜单项一起显示的附加文本。

value.span: 与所有菜单项一起显示的附加文本或字符。

span.span: The default value for this property is "{0}."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于插入文本以格式化菜单中的静态菜单项。This property can be used to insert text to format static menu items in a menu. 这是对移动设备特别有用。This is particularly useful for mobile devices. 控件支持的静态和动态菜单项，显示模板，但模板会忽略在移动设备上。The control supports templates for the display of static and dynamic menu items, but templates are ignored on mobile devices. 此属性可添加字符或文本，并可将格式应用于移动和桌面设备的菜单项不使用模板。This property allows you to add characters or text and to apply formatting to menu items for both mobile and desktop devices without using a template. > [!NOTE] > 若要获得一致的格式时使用此属性，你应设置如果你想要静态和动态菜单项之间完全相同的格式设置的属性。To achieve consistent formatting when you use this property, you should also set the property if you want the formatting to be identical between the static and dynamic menu items. 如果应用模板格式设置和此属性，模板格式对于移动设备将忽略。If both template formatting and this property are applied, the template formatting is ignored for mobile devices. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性将文本添加到每个菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to add text to each menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是使用内置呈现为静态菜单，可以定义自己的静态菜单项的用户界面 (UI)，通过使用属性。Instead of using the built-in rendering for a static menu, you can define your own user interface (UI) for a static menu item by using the property. 若要指定静态菜单项的自定义模板，请先``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify a custom template for a static menu item, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 你可以通过使用进一步控制静态菜单的样式属性。You can further control the style of a static menu by using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当静态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以展开该菜单。When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu. 使用属性指定此映像的替换文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for this image. 有两种方法来显示图像：There are two ways to display the image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于内置的映像和自定义映像。This property applies to both the built-in image and the custom image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可指定用来指示静态菜单项包含子菜单的图像的替换文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu. 当用户将鼠标指针定位图像上方时，此文本显示为工具提示。This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当静态菜单项包含子菜单时，可以显示映像以指示用户可以展开该菜单。When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu. 有两种方法，以显示此图像：There are two ways to display this image: - 设置属性`true`以使用的内置映像 （默认值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 设置属性指定自定义映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果设置属性，该映像重写内置图像，而不考虑的值属性。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image, regardless of the value of the property. 如果未设置属性和属性设置为`false`，不显示任何图像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性时，使用斜杠标记 （/） 而不是反斜杠 (\\)。When you set this property, use a slash mark (/) instead of a backslash (\\). 如果在路径中使用反斜杠，将不会显示指定的映像。If you use backslashes in the path, the specified image will not be displayed. 你可以通过设置指定的图像的替换文字属性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示在静态菜单项，如果菜单项包含子菜单的自定义映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display in a static menu item when the menu item has a submenu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuStaticPopoutImageText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuStaticPopoutImageText/CS/menustaticpopoutimagetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuStaticPopoutImageText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuStaticPopoutImageText/VB/menustaticpopoutimagetextvb.aspx#1)]

  • item_0
  • itme_1
``` 但是，在.NET Framework 4.0 和更高版本，则所选的菜单项设置为`selected`CSS 类始终是而不是指定的类`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`。However, in .NET Framework 4.0 and later, the selected menu item is set to the `selected` CSS class always instead of the class specified by `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`. 因此，而是呈现上面的 ASP.NET 代码为：Therefore, the above ASP.NET code is rendered instead as: ```

``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定所选的静态菜单项的浅蓝色背景颜色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a light blue background color for the selected static menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母（不区分大小写）打头，但某些以下划线打头的特殊值除外，如下表所示：Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 版本 5.0 和上面支持`_search`目标值For example, Internet Explorer versions 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value 此属性适用于在中的所有菜单项控件。This property applies to all menu items in a control. 你可以有选择地通过重写此属性设置每个属性直接对象。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each object directly. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为目标属性。The property renders as a target attribute. XHTML 1.1 严格文档类型定义中不允许对定位标记元素的目标属性。The target attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 或辅助功能标准，则不要设置属性。If rendered output must conform to XHTML or accessibility standards, do not set the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定内容链接到每个菜单项应显示在新窗口中，当用户单击该菜单项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the content linked to each menu item should be displayed in a new window when the user clicks that menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/CS/menutargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/VB/menutargetvb.aspx#1)]
